creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: little boy wearing red tunic and green and grey pants, slightly left of center, aiming a bow with an arrow upward; boy wearing blue tunic, yellow pants and red shoes in LLC; three other children at left; child at far left wearing pale blue holds two arrows; bare tree to left of boy with bow and arrow; line of text in black at right edge, with two square red seals below
title: Child shooting an arrow accompanied by four other children
